body: damn, some insecure lil mofos here. shhh, there there, dont worry... the big bad mean hentai drawings are never going to get you.

I feel like you guys just purposefully search for "cheating" just to make cuck comments even though it barely even qualifies here...tons of chapters over various different mangas within this universe, and we've never seen the womans husband once.
